title: how to increase character model size, map size, etc
body:
hello, 

i recently swapped computers from a 2014 macbook pro to a dell xps 9550 with the 4k UHD display. i am using the recommended size while playing of (3840x2160). the screen is great, but coming from a mac book which used a different resolution, the champions health bar above the screen, the minimap with all icons, and the minions/healthbar and cursor is extremely smaller. 

i have increased all the interface options to 100% sizing, but these do not seem to effect the areas i am specifically talking about. is there another way to turn these things up or increase the size, without switching resolutions? If there is not a way to increase them, is there another resolution you would recommend me to use to be close to what i was at? unfortunely i have already wiped the Macbook or i would go double check which resolution it was at. 

Thank you for your time!

replies.body: Since League doesn't officially support 4k resolutions quite yet, the highest resolution I'd suggest for now would be 1920x1080. It's a little unfortunate you can't make full use of that monitor with our game right now, but we're still working on getting 4k going!
